name: A Puppet Tale
description:
Welcome to this show! People of all ages, welcome to A Puppet Tale, a play like nothing you have ever seen before. Grab your seats, turn off your mobile phones and enjoy the art of play-acting. In this game you control a puppet that has to put up a play. You will have to perform well or else you will deal with the rage of the audience. Good luck in this three act play! Playwrights:
  • Alcaval
  • Dededec
Controls:
  • Hold left mouse click, drag and release to throw the puppet
  • Press Escape to pause the game
